activities: GDC manages the sourcing, licensing and maintenance of international reference data. We access various types of personal information (identity data and delivery data) from partner organizations in the EU/EEA or Switzerland via web-service for the purpose of supporting anti-fraud and mis-delivery efforts of our customer organizations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: A portion of the data processed is provided by customers requesting verification which may contain identifiable elements as it relates to individual identity.
privacyprograms: GDC data security and privacy program (self-regulated)
recoursemech: We cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
